cashback_ratio_description: When your friends recharge, you will receive a certain percentage of your balance as a reward.
invite_url_tip:
Friends who register through this link will be permanently bound to you, and you will receive a certain balance reward when they recharge.
 
In addition, when your friends register using their mobile phone number, you will immediately receive a 5 yuan reward.
 
Rewards are sent to your default team.
